snippet.title: The Cancelled I-Ninja 2 Sequel Intro
snippet.description:
Oh yes. The cult classic I-Ninja game from Argonaut Games in 2003 was supposed to get a sequel but sadly Argonaut Games went bankrupt thanks to Catwoman and Malice not selling as expected. 

So far, only concept art for the sequel has appeared on the internet but seeing this for the first time makes me feel that this game was close to completion before it was cancelled. 

This is still pretty cool to see. 

Here is the concept art that was found for the game a few years ago: https://www.siliconera.com/at-one-point-i-ninja-2-was-in-development-here-are-concepts/
